snippet: The weekend offers plenty of free outdoor dance events, including the Downtown Dance Festival, Camille A. Brown, MoralesDance, MBDance and the Kùlú Mèlé African Dance and Drum Ensemble.
lead_paragraph: The weekend offers plenty of free outdoor dance events, including the Downtown Dance Festival, Camille A. Brown, MoralesDance, MBDance and the Kùlú Mèlé African Dance and Drum Ensemble.

headline.seo: Downtown Dance Festival, African Drumming and More
